title: The Art of Itzhak Perlman 4-CD Set (Big Papi) 1993 Concerto Viol
description:
Big Papi is not qualified to rate this music as it is pure genius and skill with every movement. Big Papi used to have a friend who studied under Itzhak and to hear that friend play was one of life's purist gifts. This music has a way of gripping your soul and tearing emotions you thought never existed. Just play it, close your eyes, and let it transport you away from all the world's problems. But not if you are driving a car or you will actually end up being transported away.

The factory MP3 tags have been edited so all 4 Discs show up under 1 Album cover when viewed in your player. This provides for a cleaner appearance and consistent experience during play.

Disc 1 has 2 tracks with AccurateRip flags. It states inaccurate but the hashes are green as if good. The source CD is like new although from 1993. Big Papi could find no discernible issues with these 2 tracks. If you can locate any errors please submit them for a chance to win an 800HP 2015 Chevy Camaro.

- Big Papi
